goals__remit: DAF Trucks N.V. (DAF) develops, produces and sells trucks and parts under the DAF nameplate for the European market as well as international markets, including South America, Austraila, Africa, Asia and the Middle East. In addition, DAF sells components, engines, axles and cabins to other PACCAR companies and to third party manufacturers of busses, coaches and special vehicels.
